title: Hill-side and border sketches:
author: Maxwell, W. H.
snippet: Lord Derwentwater and Mr. Forster, having narrowly escaped arrest, took the desperate resolution of declaring openly against the house of Hanover ; and, with sixty horse, took possession of the town of Wark worth.

title: Hill-side and border sketches:
author: Maxwell, W. H.
snippet: invaded England, he reduced Wark and Etal, and then occupied Ford Castle, which he made headquarters.
